messages.title: Web Developer
messages.about.title: About Me
messages.about.info.whatsAppWhy: Currently abroad until the end of August, I am more easily accessible via WhatsApp
messages.about.content:
Passionate about programming since I was a teenager, I undertook 5 years of studies at ETNA. Focusing initially in low level programming, I quickly had many experiences in web development through my first internships, both front-end, back-end and DevOps; I have, through these 5 years of study, worn several hats expanding my field of expertise. 

At the end of my studies, I started to become a freelancer. I define myself as a: freelance web developer "full stack" (although I may feel a little more comfortable with the back-end over time). 

At first I specialized on a stack around JavaScript because it's just as useful in front and backend development (even mobile): React.js, React-Native, Node.js, Typescript. Then, in the last few years, I became very interested in other languages in order to be able to answer more and more problems (Golang, Rust, for example). I have also worked as a DevOps in some of my missions, so I master Docker, Kubernetes, Firebase, GCP, Vercel and AWS very well.

Communication is for me a very important quality in this field, that's why I also tend to share my knowledge (through courses, articles or by attending many Meetup events).

Current focus: React / TypeScript / DevOps

messages.resume.workExperience.Quadient.descripti: Quadient is a company specializing in logistics equipment and mail processing.
messages.resume.workExperience.Quadient.role: Role: Back End Developer. Development of new features in Node.js, Python, ETL implementation with AWS tools, Integration & unit tests
messages.resume.workExperience.Homeserve.title: Full Stack Developer
messages.resume.workExperience.Homeserve.descript: To protect the home of the French and allow them to have a simple and quick solution in case of failure, HomeServe offers its assistance contracts.
messages.resume.workExperience.Homeserve.role: Role: Full Stack Developer. Development of compatable administration tools in Python and modernization of the Front End application. Python, Typescript, Node.js, React, Integration & unit tests
messages.resume.workExperience.Aktome.title: Front End Developer
messages.resume.workExperience.Aktome.description: At the service of experience collaborators. Because the problem is not always between the chair and the keyboard.
messages.resume.workExperience.Aktome.role: Role: Front End Developer. Development of the payroll application in React.js. React, Redux, Typescript, Integration & unit tests
messages.resume.workExperience.Kardinal.title: Full Stack JS Developer
messages.resume.workExperience.Kardinal.descripti: The companion solution for route optimization, based on top-notch technologies.
messages.resume.workExperience.Kardinal.role: Role: Developer Full Stack JS. Development of micro-services in Golang, aggregation tool (Gateway) developed with NestJS Typescript, front end development with React, Redux, TypeScript
messages.resume.workExperience.Visitadom.title: Front End Developer
messages.resume.workExperience.Visitadom.descript: Visitadom est une plateforme qui met en relation les patients et les praticiens de santé à domicile.
messages.resume.workExperience.Visitadom.role: Role: Front End Developer. Integration of mock-ups, development of authentication pages, practitioner search and appointment scheduling. React, Typescript, Hooks
messages.resume.workExperience.AWE.title: Full Stack Developer
messages.resume.workExperience.AWE.description: AWE is a consulting, technology and marketing services firm. We are helping our clients with strategy, data management, content marketing, performance management and marketing automation.

messages.resume.workExperience.One2Team.descripti: You need agility and autonomy, at start-up pace — but with the complexity of scale. See how One2Team's work management platform empowers teams and breaks silos while reducing files, rework and deadlines.

messages.resume.education.ETNA.description: The École des technologies numériques appliquées (ETNA) is a French private school in computer science localized at Ivry-sur-Seine. Created in 2005 by Patrice Dumoucel, the school since 2006 is part of IONIS Education Group. The certification delivered by the school are recognized by the French state.
